articles.author: Alexandra Bellusci
articles.title: Drew Barrymore Steps Down as Host of 2023 MTV Movie & TV Awards 3 Days Before Show - E! NEWS
articles.description: Drew Barrymore stepped down from hosting the 2023 MTV Movie & TV Awards in solidarity with striking members of the Writers Guild of America.
articles.content:
Drew Barrymore has relinquished her hosting duties.
The Drew Barrymore Show host stepped down from hosting the 2023 MTV Movie & TV Awards on May 7 in solidarity with the Writers Guild of America… [+790 chars]
